text: Eugene Onegin () is a 1959 Soviet movie directed by Roman Tikhomirov.В Пушкинский день в Москве покажут лучшие экранизации произведений поэтаЕВГЕНИЙ ОНЕГИН (1958) It stars Vadim Medvedev, Igor Ozerov, and Ariadna Shengelaya. ==Actors== *Vadim Medvedev – Eugene Onegin (sung by Yevgeny Kibkalo) *Igor Ozerov – Vladimir Lensky (sung by Anton Grigoryev) *Ariadna Shengelaya – Tatyana Larina (sung by Galina Vishnevskaya) *Svetlana Nemolyayeva – Olga Larina (sung by Larisa Avdeyeva) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1959 movies
title: Eugene Onegin (1959 movie)
